title: Part 606 - Legal And Medical Services; Duties Of Counsel Respecting Appeals
content:
Part 606 - Legal And Medical Services; Duties Of Counsel Respecting Appeals

State Regulations
§ 606.1 - Assignments pursuant to section 35 of the Judiciary Law
§ 606.2 - Compensation for extraordinary services
§ 606.3 - Expenses of assigned counsel, psychiatrists or physicians
§ 606.4 - Determination of financial ability
§ 606.5 - Duties of counsel with respect to representation of defendants in criminal actions
§ 606.6 - Additional duties of the court and of defendant's counsel in connection with trial court transcripts
§ 606.7 - Assignment of counsel in Family Court
§ 606.8 - Appointment of attorneys for children in Family Court
§ 606.9 - Assignment of counsel in Surrogate's Court

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
